query:
UPDATE drops SET 
  price = 4500000,
  imageUrl = 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1556821840-3a63f95609a7?w=800'
WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE drops SET 
  price = 2800000,
  imageUrl = 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1599643478518-a784e5dc4c8f?w=800'
WHERE id = 2;
